question: What is DevFest?
answer: DevFests are local tech conferences hosted by Google Developer Groups (GDG) around the world. These are community led developer events organised for local developers to connect, learn and innovate together.

question: What is Google Developer Group (GDG) ?
answer: Google Developer Groups (GDG) is the largest developer community in the world. Each GDG is a local community hub of professional developers who share expertise and passion for Google's developer technology. GDG communities coordinate community activities centered around helping developers learn, connect, and grow while building a strong sense of belonging to the local and global tech community.

question: What is unique about DevFest 2023?
answer: Different from a meetup or speaker session, DevFests cover multiple topics and offer a suite of activities that aim to help local developers come together to learn, build and understand the full suite of Google's developer tools and tech trends.

question: What will I get by participating in DevFest?
answer: It's a great opportunity to forge new connections, learn from the industry experts and keep up on the newest trends. Along with cool swags ofcourse!

question: Who can register for DevFest Indore 2023?
answer: Anyone with the passion of technology, will to learn and connect can join the event. From novice beginners to working professionals, anyone can register and attend DevFest.

question: Is it mandatory to register in order to participate in the event?
answer: Yes! It is required to register, in order for us to make the best of arrangements for you. It will be great if you register to ensure you get live updates and important resources to your mailbox.

question: Will the sessions be moderated?
answer: Yes! We have dedicated volunteers who will moderate all the sessions. If you witness any attendee breaching the code of conduct, please reach out to us at 'gdgindore@gmail.com'.

question: How can I gain more from the summit?
answer: Please join the summit on time. We recommend that you participate in the interactive sessions.

question: How can I communicate my queries?
answer: You can reach out to us at our email at: gdgindore@gmail.com .
